title: "UK Fintech Zilch Secures $10 Million For Buy Now Pay Later Business"
excerpt: "UK fintech Zilch announced on Thursday it secured $10 million through its latest funding round. Founded in 2018, Zilch offers a Buy Now Pay Later service that allows users to pay for a purchase in the course of six weeks without any fees or interest."
